bwwExcerpt: Blankenbuehler's production just never stops for a moment, sometimes at the expense of the narrative flow and certainly at some cost when it comes to getting to know and care about these characters, especially Donny and Julia, played by actors who never fully connect emotionally, not least because they don't really get enough scenes to help them.
